abstract: An array of libraries to load at initialization.
overview:
## Discussion

MapKit JS divides its interfaces into libraries that you can specify when loading the framework. To optimize your app load time, pick only the interfaces you need:

You can set the libraries to load statically by defining them within script tag in the `data-libraries` attribute or in the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/load] method, or by passing a `libraries` property in the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/init] options.

# libraries

**Interface Property**

An array of libraries to load at initialization.

## Declaration

```swift
libraries?: string[];
```

## Discussion



MapKit JS divides its interfaces into libraries that you can specify when loading the framework. To optimize your app load time, pick only the interfaces you need:



You can set the libraries to load statically by defining them within script tag in the `data-libraries` attribute or in the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/load] method, or by passing a `libraries` property in the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/init] options.
title: libraries
